## IElementsOptions interface

Options to modify the syntax tree of the hast code block.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IElementsOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [code](./highlighter.ielementsoptions.code.md) | <code>readonly</code> | (props: Partial&lt;ICodeElementProps&gt;) =&gt; Element | Override function for <code>code</code> tags. |
|  [line](./highlighter.ielementsoptions.line.md) | <code>readonly</code> | (props: Partial&lt;ILineElementProps&gt;) =&gt; Element | Override function for code block lines. |
|  [pre](./highlighter.ielementsoptions.pre.md) | <code>readonly</code> | (props: Partial&lt;IPreElementProps&gt;) =&gt; Element | Override function for <code>pre</code> tags. |
|  [token](./highlighter.ielementsoptions.token.md) | <code>readonly</code> | (props: Partial&lt;ITokenElementProps&gt;) =&gt; Element | Override function for code block tokens. |
